title: Development of Evaluation Strategies for Remote English Teaching Certification Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary English education practical experience and basic digital teaching tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Targeting in-service secondary English teachers to strengthen competencies in designing and applying assessment strategies in remote educational settings.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze five literature-based assessment principles and explain their application in remote education contexts.
Learners can integrate three types of formative assessment tools (quizzes, feedback checklists, etc.) into actual lesson designs.
Learners can implement strategies to ensure assessment fairness for large-scale online learners (rubrics, peer evaluation systems).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
